text: Darius Demetrius Slay Jr. is an American football corner back. He plays for the Philadelphia Eagles. Slay was also a former corner back for the Detroit Lions. Slay is a 3x Pro Bowler 1x All Pro team in 2017. Darius Slay was born January 1, 1991 in Brunswick, GA. Category:American football cornerbacks Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:People from Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Darius Slay
